parameters.query:
SELECT o.*, c.whatsapp_number, c.name as customer_name
FROM orders o
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.id
WHERE o.status IN ('pending', 'awaiting_payment')
  AND o.expires_at < NOW()
  AND o.expires_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour';

INSERT INTO conversation_context (customer_id, session_id, intent, current_state, context_data)
VALUES (
  (SELECT id FROM customers WHERE whatsapp_number = '{{ $json.whatsapp_number }}'),
  'order_expired_{{ $json.order_number }}',
  'order_expired',
  'greeting',
  '{"last_expired_order": "{{ $json.order_number }}"}'::jsonb
)
ON CONFLICT (customer_id) DO UPDATE
SET context_data = jsonb_set(
  conversation_context.context_data,
  '{last_expired_order}',
  '"{{ $json.order_number }}"'::jsonb
);
